content:
Hey y'all - just joined, hope this is a good place to ask.

I recently upgraded cargo-component and I'm getting no registry configured for namespace "foo" errors... wkg config shows a valid default registry... any idea what's up?
ah, had to update wkg too and then reset the default registry

Glad you were able to get past it! Just to be clear, your fix was that the version of wkg was outdated?

If you went off of the template and got an outdated version maybe this is something we can update
didn't go off a template exactly... manually installing things, copying from older code, local deps... probably off the beaten path a bit :)
OK well if there was anywhere the documentation could have been more helpful please feel free to file issues or report it here! Would love to know how it could have been better
